author: slava77
body:
Updates to Reco Comparisons: 
- update the map to include 2018 premix
    - this will resolve the "missing map" warning in the jenkins tests
- add plots for discarded candidates in 80XLegacy miniAOD
    - this is a new small collection (to be) added for re-miniAOD workflows
title: Reco Comparisons: update the map to include 2018 premix; add plots for discarded candidates in 80XLegacy miniAOD
